document_data.name: Sarlannus Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Sarlannus Street''' was a street running northâ€“south through the [[Temple District (Athkatla)|Temple District]] in the city of [[Athkatla]].
document_data.Geography: The southern end of the street connected to wide road called [[Godsmoot]]. On the corner was the [[Crown Aflame]] theater.
document_data.Notable locations:
*[[Crown Aflame|The Crown Aflame]]: A popular Athkatlan theater.
*House of [[Thammas Thoul]]: Home of the spice merchant and art collector.
*[[Society of the Lost Ingot]]: This private club catered to spectacularly wealthy, male Athkatlan merchant princes.
